senselogic.sitevision.api.log

Interface LogUtil


  • @Requireable(value="LogUtil")
public interface LogUtil
    Logging utility class for simple logging to the Sitevision server log.

    If you implement a custom portlet you would typically use a logging framework, not this class.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getLogUtil(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Detail

      • isTraceEnabled

        boolean isTraceEnabled()
        Checks if trace logging is enabled.

        Appropriate to check first if you are about to do extensive/expensive trace logging.

        Returns:
        true if trace logging is enabled, false otherwise
        Since:
        Sitevision 4.1

      • trace

        void trace(String aMessage)
        Logs a trace message to the Sitevision server log.
        Parameters:
        aMessage - a message.
        Since:
        Sitevision 4.1

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
